item.title: Linux:Iptables Cheatsheet
item.description: 5 types of tables: Filter NAT Mangle Raw Security Last two tables are not very frequently used. Default table is Filter table. List table: sudo iptables -L -n -v L: list n: numeric format v: verbose since no table was mentioned in the above command, it will list all contents of default table, Filter. below will display contents of mangle table: sudo iptables -t mangle -L -n -v Syntax of iptables is case sensitive.
